thread.title: The Internet Freaks Out Over Lady Gaga's Rooftop Super Bowl Leap
thread.title_full: The Internet Freaks Out Over Lady Gaga's Rooftop Super Bowl Leap

author: Andy McDonald
title: The Internet Freaks Out Over Lady Gaga's Rooftop Super Bowl Leap
text:
The Internet Freaks Out Over Lady Gaga's Rooftop Super Bowl Leap People lost their Gaga-damned minds. 02/05/2017 09:47 pm ET Andy McDonald Comedy Writer / Editor, The Huffington Post 
The Super Bowl LI audience expected something special from Lady Gaga ’s halftime performance, but on Sunday, she didn’t really blow off the roof ... She JUMPED off the roof. 
Sometimes, we take situations like this for granted. “Oh, there’s a pop singer perched high above the crowd! Surely, after she’s done singing an intro, the camera will pan away and focus on dancers or something while said pop star gets down to ground level like a human being.” 
NOPE, not Gaga. After singing some patriotic tunes on the roof of NRG Stadium in Houston, Lady Gaga leaped off the top of the stadium ― and people on the internet lost their Gaga-damned minds. Wait, Lady Gaga seriously jumped from the roof pic.twitter.com/Io5SxY4l0i — SI Extra Mustard (@SI_ExtraMustard) February 6, 2017 LADY GAGA DID NOT JUMP OFF THE FUCKING ROOF FOR YOU TO CALL HER PERFORMANCE "MEDIOCRE"
